# accessibilityLabel(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a label to the chart content that describes its contents.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func accessibilityLabel(_ label: Text) -> some ChartContent

```

## Configuring accessibility

- **accessibilityHidden(_:)**: Specifies whether to hide this chart content from system accessibility features.
- **accessibilityIdentifier(_:)**: Adds an identifier string to the chart content.
- **accessibilityLabel(_:)**: Adds a label to the chart content that describes its contents.
- **accessibilityLabel(_:)**: Adds a label to the chart content that describes its contents.
- **accessibilityLabel(_:)**: Adds a label to the chart content that describes its contents.
- **accessibilityValue(_:)**: Adds a description of the value that the chart content contains.
- **accessibilityValue(_:)**: Adds a description of the value that the chart content contains.
- **accessibilityValue(_:)**: Adds a description of the value that the chart content contains.
- **accessibilityValue(_:)**: Adds a description of the value that the chart content contains.
